word: (1 Peter 2:5; 1 Corinthians 3:11-13.) Some Are Not What They Appear.-- Many, from worldly policy, endeavor, by their own efforts, to become as polished stones, but cannot be living stones, because they are not built upon the true foundation. The day of God will reveal that they are, in reality, only hay, wood, and stubble (Redemption: or the Teachings of Paul, p. 78).
